sub-events.comment: Calculate Player Standing (0-3) based on Renown. First selects the array column where the player score is stored as loopindex. This represents the player standing

checkRandomEvents fills the EventsList Array with events, depending on probabilities and conditions. This is usually the entry point into the "Decisions" events, unless the EventList Array is already set to a single predefined action, in which case events can jump directly into the Decisions instead of calling checkRandomEvents.
A challenge arrives at a rival's home
Rival takes on a challenge at his home (HELP challenges)
Rival Raises Taxes-> Increase Land and Ronin
Travels if leader has a mission and samurai is worthy - or if the samurai hates the player or is low honor.

action.name: Log
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" is traveling with his troops."

sub-events.comment: Rival takes on a leader challenge while ALONE
Rival Threatens Player when he doesnt like him and when the player is first.
Go through list of possible awaiting events for leader (index 1), see which are set to 0, and possibly set them to 1 (event arrives)
